definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: The occupiers immediately froze wages and made strikes illegal .
sentences.chinese: 佔領軍立即宣佈凍結工資並規定罷工爲非法。

sentences.english: That's one of the problems you get if you are a leading figure in sport.
sentences.chinese: 在體育圈成爲一個領軍人物，會導致一個問題。

sentences.english: After the people of Israel left Egypt, Pharaoh regretted and pursued the people of Israel with his army.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人出埃及後，法老後悔而帶領軍兵去追殺。

sentences.english: Saloner has been a leader in the evolution of management education.
sentences.chinese: 塞隆納一直是管理教育理論發展方面的領軍人物。

sentences.english: With the animation network, make Chinese animation industry leader.
sentences.chinese: 一起動漫網，做中國動漫產業的領軍者。

sentences.english: Kraft stands to lose not only a lucrative business but also some "category captaincies".
sentences.chinese: 卡夫不僅失去了獲利頗豐的業務而且部分領軍地位。

sentences.english: D. Gann will receive full recognition as one of Wall Street's leading operators. R. D.
sentences.chinese: 江恩就會以華爾街領軍人物之一的身份廣受讚譽。

sentences.english: It's believed that the Japanese picked up the work from his Tokyo headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 據傳，日本人就是從他在東京的佔領軍總部得到它的。

sentences.english: The army of occupation had orders not to ill - treat the local citizenry .
sentences.chinese: 佔領軍被命令不得迫害當地居民。

sentences.english: He is a leader in the sign-making industry – a real big gun, if you know what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 他是廣告牌製作行業的領軍人物，一位真正的大咖。

sentences.english: The two experts helped Japan become a world leader in quality control.
sentences.chinese: 着兩位專家幫助日本成爲質量控制的世界領軍人。

sentences.english: Wanhua is taking the leadership across China's polyurethane industry.
sentences.chinese: 萬華是中國聚氨酯產業的領軍企業。

sentences.english: She has two Nobel Prizes for her work in radioactive materials.
sentences.chinese: 如何工作方面是絕對的領軍人物。

sentences.english: Party a hope and become a local restaurant fashion leader.
sentences.chinese: 甲方希望成爲當地餐飲的時尚領軍者。

sentences.english: But the UK the world leader in online retail.
sentences.chinese: 而英國則是在線零售業領軍人物。

sentences.english: But now Android isn't just the operating system market share leader.
sentences.chinese: 現如今，安卓已不僅僅領軍操作系統市場份額。

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
